text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 329 BIODIVERSITY AND OPEN SPACE 18.77 As part of major development proposals, BNG commitments will be secured and monitored by planning obligation or condition. 18.78 The policy applies to all major development proposals and most minor proposals, with only the following development being exempt from mandatory BNG, consistent with national guidance: a. for minor development proposals only, development impacting habitat of an area below a ‘de minimis’ threshold of 25 metres squared, or 5m for linear habitats such as hedgerows and watercourses; b. householder applications; c. BNG sites (where habitats are being enhanced for wildlife); and d. small scale self-build and custom housebuilding. 18.79 While change of use applications are not specifically exempt, the majority of types of change of use applications will be exempt through the de minimis habitat exemption.
